settings.title: Settings
settings.updateMessage: This will clear your cache and update to the latest version. You'll be reloaded to the updated app.
settings.syncConfirmMessage: This will overwrite your local exercises with the default list. Custom exercises may be lost. Are you sure?
settings.syncCompleteMessage: Exercises have been reset to default.
settings.syncFailedMessage: Failed to sync exercises. Please try again.
settings.swNotSupported: Service worker not supported in this browser.
settings.updatingMessage: Clearing cache and applying update. Reloading...
settings.updateFailedMessage: Failed to apply update. See console for details.

changelog.title: Changelog
changelog.subtitle: Track all updates and changes to the workout app
changelog.errorMessage: The commits.json file could not be loaded. Make sure to run the build script to generate it.
changelog.noCommits: No commits found in the changelog.

exerciseDetail.noHistory: No workout history for this exercise yet.

workoutLogger.workoutLoggedMessage: Your workout has been saved successfully!
workoutLogger.workoutSyncMessage: Your workout has been saved successfully and will be synced to the cloud.
